trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings*> collection of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings*>coleção de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings*>

trans-unit.source: The MenuBindingsEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> collection within the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe MenuBindingsEditor fornece uma interface do usuário para edição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>coleção dentro associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The MenuBindingsEditor object is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **DataBindings** property in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, or by choosing **Edit Menu Items** from the **Common Tasks** context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: O objeto MenuBindingsEditor é invocado selecionando as reticências (**... **) botão o **DataBindings** propriedade no **propriedades** grade do visual designer, ou escolhendo **editar itens de Menu** do **tarefas comuns** menu de contexto no controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the values of the data bindings collection of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor.EditValue%2A>método edita os valores da coleção de associações de dados de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método obtém o estilo de edição que está associado este editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor> class when you select the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **DataBindings** property in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, or by choosing **Edit Menu Items** from the **Common Tasks** context menu on the control, when designing the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância da classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor>quando você seleciona as reticências (**... **) botão o **DataBindings** propriedade no **propriedades** grade do visual designer, ou escolhendo **editar itens de Menu** do **tarefas comuns de** menu de contexto no controle, ao projetar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuBindingsEditor>

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the data bindings collection of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor da coleção de associações de dados de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The EditValue method extracts the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object that is associated with that control from the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método EditValue extrai associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>objeto que está associado ao controle do `context` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Then the EditValue method calls back on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object to display an editing dialog box that is used to edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O método EditValue chama novamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>objeto para exibir uma caixa de diálogo de edição que é usada para editar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface that is used to acquire context information.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> interface é usada para obter informações de contexto.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> interface, through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IServiceProvider>interface, por meio do qual edição services pode ser obtido.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para editar o valor.

trans-unit.source: The new value; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, value unchanged.
trans-unit.target: O novo value ; caso contrário, se o valor do objeto não foi alterado, value inalterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de edição que está associado este editor.

trans-unit.source: The GetEditStyle method always returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value, which indicates that the editor user interface (UI) is a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEditStyle sempre retorna o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>valor que indica que a interface de usuário do editor (UI) é uma caixa de diálogo modal.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> interface que indica o contexto do objeto que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: O estilo de edição que está associado este editor.
